org.spongepowered.api.event.advancement

Interface AdvancementEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event, TargetEntityEvent, TargetHumanoidEvent, TargetLivingEvent, TargetPlayerEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdvancementEvent.Grant, AdvancementEvent.Revoke, CriterionEvent, CriterionEvent.Grant, CriterionEvent.Revoke, CriterionEvent.Score, CriterionEvent.Score.Change, CriterionEvent.Score.Grant, CriterionEvent.Score.Revoke, CriterionEvent.Trigger<C>

    public interface AdvancementEvent
extends TargetPlayerEvent
    A base event for Advancement related events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AdvancementEvent.Grant
      Is called when a Advancement is granted/unlocked.
      static interface  AdvancementEvent.Revoke
      Is called when a AdvancementCriterion is revoked.
